api_list.name: Shop Items
api_list.description: This API gets you all the items within the Seller's Shop. Combining with the shop's categories API, you can collect and represent the best and comfortable feeling of shopping and sorting items.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Returned results sorting. Available options: Best match (default), Sales descending (sales_des), Price ascending (price_asc), Price descending (price_des), New arrivals first (new_arrivals).

api_list.name: Taobao - Item Search
Item Detail (NEW with Promo Price)
api_list.description: Advanced Item Detail API that includes all the information about the product, information about the seller, shipping prices, SKU's description images, videos, etc.

api_list.name: Item Review
api_list.description: Along with the Advanced Item Detail API, this API shows all the reviews for this selected item completing the whole package of information about the product possible.

api_list.name: Item Detail
api_list.description: Advanced Item Detail API that includes all the information about the product, information about the seller, shipping prices, SKU's description images, videos, etc.

api_list.name: Item Search By Image
api_list.description: With this API you will be able to get all related items to the image provided. Keep in must image must be from Taobao to work.

required_parameters.name: img
required_parameters.description: Any image url that is from Taobao.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: The specific location from an image that search is focused on.

api_list.name: Shop Categories
api_list.description: Gets the list of categories within the seller's shop. This API should be combined with Shop Items API to pass the details of categories for items filtering.
